sources.title: $21 Million Arthur J. Gallagher Data Breach Settlement
sources.snippet: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. and Gallagher Bassett Services have settled a $21 million class action lawsuit over allegations that they mishandled nearly 3,500,000 individuals' personally identifiable information when a hacker was able to steal sensitive information in a massive data breach incident back in 2020.
